lead_paragraph: In poking fun at the Miss America pageant on the most recent episode of HBO's "Last Week Tonight," John Oliver reached for the comedic equivalent of low-hanging fruit. Then he veered into something wholly unexpected — investigative journalism.

headline.main: Oliver Adds Journalism to His Comedy
headline.print_headline: Oliver Adds Journalism to His Comedy
